name: The harrowing life of the violet snail
name_original: The harrowing life of the violet snail
description:
**Minor photosensitivity warning for a short sequence ~4 minutes in**

An interactive reading and visualization about the violet snail.  ~6 minutes long.

Text by Dr. Rebecca Helm, Georgetown University, with some minor editing by myself.
You can read the original post here: https://jellybiologist.com/2020/08/03/the-harrowing-life-of-the-violet-snail/

Controls

Advance the text with Mouse Left-Click or the Enter key.
Press R to restart.
Other controls, which are provided in game:

  • WASD/Arrow keys to look
  • Space to cling/move
  • Hold then release B to make a bubble. (Hold for 3-4 seconds)

If only a black screen seems to load on start up, make sure to click into the game.

Made based on the prompt "Non-human POV" for Prototype Studio at the NYUGC.
